description: Minimum of largest partial quotient of continued fraction for k/n, (k,n) = 1.
references: H. Niederreiter, Dyadic functions with small partial quotients, Monat. f. Math., 101 (1986), 309-315.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
